Btw, this installed perfectly for me. I have tried 4 times before in the past, couldn't get it to work and deleted the .Iso. 
Here are the steps I took if it helps anyone:
1. Download
2. Mount .Iso
3. Open The Disk (Explore or Open in New Window)
4. Run Steambackup2.exe
5. Put Crack Found On The Iso Into PAM Install Folder (Copy and Replace)
6. Don't Forget To Support The Software Companies!
7. Have Fun :)
Works perfectly, thank you for uploading.
